    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);

        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }

        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);

        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        }

            bodyClassList.push(fmt);

        }

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];

        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);

            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);

        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];

                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }

        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

            pagemode = 'mobile';

        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

            bodyClassList.push(fmt);

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];

                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);

            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);

        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}

    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {

            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);

            pagemode = 'mobile';

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);

        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];

                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

            <section class="blurbs">

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }

            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }

        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

<body class="toc">
    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }

        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];

                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if (fmt) {
            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof catType !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
            for (var i = 0, len = bodyClassList.length; i < len; i++){
                if (bodyClassList[i] === 'map') { mode = undefined; }
            }
            if (mode) { bodyClassList.push(mode); }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0];

            pagemode = fmt;
            bodyClassList.push(fmt);
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
            bodyClassList.push(pagemode);

        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(catType + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1];
